name: Do Slugs Dream Of Snails? Demo
name_original: Do Slugs Dream Of Snails? Demo
description:
Overview

This game is a local co-op 2D puzzler for 2 people.

4 Ways To Control

1. Sharing a keyboard.

2. XBox controller + keyboard

3. XBox controllers

4. Joy-Cons (Sharing a pair)

*If you connect too many controllers (or only one Joy-Con), the game will choose keyboard mode.


Support me: http://ko-fi.com/shiorikanaoka

Website: http://shiorikanaoka.com/game-projects/do-slugs-dream-of-snails

Presskit: http://shiorikanaoka.com/game-projects/do-slugs-dream-of-snails/presskit
